reviews.text: Do not buy the empanadas. They are full of nothing but air. I bought shrimp empanadas and when I bit into one, it had only 3 little pieces of shrimp with veggies and the majority of the inside was just air.
Foods not bad but they use to much garlic in everything!

We were looking for something authentic, and this place lives up to that. The staff were super friendly and extremely patient, as they had to explain everything to us! food was great recommend if your in the area.
A little humble spot in Harlem. Very down to earth vibes and good food at reasonable prices. The girl serving us was super friendly
Food is good value for the price

The food was very good. Our table ordered a sampling platter and everything on it was delicious. I also ordered a pollo monfango which was very filling and satisfying. However, despite the good food we were really the only people in the restaurant and our wait for our food was over an hour. We were a party of 5 which may have contributed to it, though.
Had the chicken fongo and it was fine.

The food is authentic, fresh& delicious.

I was there today to celebrate my friend's retirement. Great experience! The food was amazingly good. I had the meatballs-dominican style- with rice and beans and maduros and a side salad. Simply delicious! The place was empty (we were there at 2:30pm) which made it even better. I love the atmosphere of the patio. Drinks were good. Prices very affordable. Michell was our waitress and she was simply lovely. Thank you to Wendy too. We are definitely going back soon.
I almost forgot to mention. There is no problem at all with parking.

This is a go-to when I‚Äôm in the area. Food is fantastic, reminds me a lot of the Spanish food my grandmother would make for us growing up. I‚Äôd only suggest to avoid going too close to closing time as the food could be a bit dry. But even then, it‚Äôs still delicious.
I love the side garden. I love watching movies on the tv while I drink. It's empty, quiet and dark. I love it. I got a few times a week.

Came here August 31st great food and awesome service. Will return when I come back to visit my family.
One of the best mofongos I've ever tried. Authentic PR food. Everything tasted so delicious. Highly recommend it
You need to update your times it says they're open until 10 and they are closed by 8 pm
Their lunch specials are so good, and their customer service makes you feel almost like family/friends. 10/10 - I love this place.

The food was delicious. I tried Trifongo for the first time. I enjoyed it. We also got a Flan. It was delicious.

Love this place.. I just had a chicken sandwich with all kinds of tasty goodness between fried plantains instead of bread .. And a side salad & bottle of water for only $12 ! Restaurants like El Patio De Fela give a neighborhood it's unique flavor..no pun intended:)

Great little neighborhood spot in East Harlem. Big fan. Food is great and the actual patio is very nice. They did a great job.

Great Spanish food, variety of prepared food and good company. There's a beautiful patio seating area which is being enclosed for fall enjoyment.  Worth your time, stop by and visit. (Btw, the fish soup is slamming!!!)
